title: How Long Should You Wait To Have Sex? - Kinda Funny Podcast (Ep. 215)
description:
Go to http://meundies.com/kindafunny to get 15% off your first order.

Go to http://creditkarma.com to find the card for you.

SnowBikeMike joins us to discuss how long you should wait until you bang or move in together.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:08:00 - Chevys and other local  gems
00:21:00 - Nick’s terrible experience
00:28:45 - Mr. Beast makes a chocolate factoy
00:38:09 - When do you move in a  relationship?
00:50:09 - I’ve microwaved my phone
